sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Psmisc package contains the fuser, killall, pidof and pstree programs.

sect3.title: fuser
sect3.para: fuser displays the PIDs of processes using the specified files or file systems.

sect3.title: killall
sect3.para: killall sends a signal to all processes running any of the specified commands.

sect3.title: pidof
sect3.para: Pidof finds the process id's (pids) of the named programs and prints those id's on standard output.

sect3.title: pstree
sect3.para: pstree shows running processes as a tree.
